name: Lost in Translation (Xenvex, conanvegeta, Cristian277, rproct)
name_original: Lost in Translation (Xenvex, conanvegeta, Cristian277, rproct)
description:
Install instructions

For both downloads, you'll see a window like the one down below

To get past this, just click "More info", and then "Run Anyway".

This whole thing just happens because Windows doesn't trust the GMS2 installer because they're relationship isn't too good at the moment.

For the Zip version, you're gonna wanna extract the files first before trying to run it.
